com.example.noteation.databases

Class SqlDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.example.noteation.databases.SqlDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SqlDB
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class is the ORM (Object Relational Mapper), it's in charge of linking between the java code and the Sqlite database
